圖全掛了

replies.author: 哇哈哈你是猪
replies.txt_content: 把高清材质装到有高清补丁的客户端里

replies.author: csol
replies.txt_content:
不是= =就是出现Error    There was an error opening minecraft.jar.This may be because:
The file has already been patched.
There was an update that this patcher cannot handle
There is another,conflicting mod applied.
The jar file is invalid or corrupt   啥啥啥的

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
csol 发表于 2012-7-28 11:03 
不是= =就是出现Error    There was an error opening minecraft.jar.This may be because:
The file has  ...
1. 强烈建议：请用原版minecraft.jar来打高清补丁！
2. 告诉我，你已经向minecraft.jar里安装过些什么了？如果装的东西不多，你可以无视你碰到的这个错误提示；如果装多了，或者装了特定的mod，那么请删除minecraft.jar重新下载一个原版纯净的
